page.title: 04Education
page.content: Education. The area has a sufficient number of primary schools,but in recent years the roles have fallen and continue to fall,primarily because families tend to be smaller than in the past. Sadly,though we have the schools, facilities and equipment grow less due to the economic depression ,and children are being denied of the benifits, which would enrich their educational needs. There is also a technical college which caters for job_release personel and for those wishing to pursue further adult education.
